alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Southern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 3:16PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Middlesex and central New Haven Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Derby to near Wallingford. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Haven, Meriden, Milford, Wallingford, Shelton, Guilford, Durham, Chester, Hamden, Cheshire, Branford, North Haven, Seymour, North Branford and Orange. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Southern New Haven
